content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find an espresso machine. Moving in a clockwise direction from the espresso machine, the elements on the path are a bustard, a dragonfly, a night snake, a leatherback sea turtle, a lipstick, a crossword, a triceratops, a home theater, and a water buffalo. Starting from the dragonfly, you move around the ring by 7 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 9 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 2 steps in a counter-clockwise direction.
